message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40. You get a good chunk, and I get a bit more for making the offer.
Your split was unfair, let's be reasonable. I'm proposing a 55/45 split in my favor. Take it now, or risk getting even less in the next round.
Considering the inflation, my previous offer is more reasonable now. I'll give you a bit more than last time, but I still think I deserve a bigger share for being the one making the offer.
This is getting ridiculous.  Accept this 51/49 split, or I will no longer negotiate.  The longer this goes on, the less we both get!
